attributes.action: Fund The Following Projects In London Instead Of Paying The EU For Trade Talks.
attributes.additional_details:
1 Fund the Garden Bridge project.

2 Turn Battersea Power Station into a museum 

3 Fund the purchase of Enviro400H City to be rolled out on every London Bus Route except for routes that use New Routemasters

4 Fund and introduce a new modern version of the old slam-door trains in London

5 Help fund the New Tube for London project 

Make '4 and 5' the first train and tube in the world to use Hydrogen fuel from sunlight, this way

https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2017/10/171013091955.htm
attributes.background:
Today Jean-Claude Juncker said that we will have to pay billions to the EU for trade talks.

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4976852/You-pay-Juncker-demands-Brexit-talks-cash.html

However lots countries are happy to trade with us, especially Donald Trump. 

So forget the EU talks and

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "paying the EU for trade talks". Also, not all of the projects you list would be the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. Many of them are the responsibility of Transport for London, which is accountable to the London Assembly. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
